row.col:
The inclusion or exclusion of items from this list, or length of this list is disputed.
Please discuss this issue on the .

bdy.p:
A USB key
Portable software is a class of software that is suitable for use on portable drives such as a
USB (thumb) drive
or iPod or
Palm PDA
with "drive mode", although any external hard drive could theoretically be used. 1 2 The concept of carrying one's favored applications, utilities, and files on a portable drive for use on any computer is one which has evolved considerably in recent years.
Programs in this category (also known as portable applications) are typically 'lite' versions of their parent software, but there are many exceptions.
To be considered portable, for purpose of this list, a software program must:

list.entry: Not require any kind of formal installation onto a computer's permanent storage device to be executed, and can be stored on a removable storage device such as USB flash drive, enabling it to be used on multiple computers.
Settings are stored with, and can be carried around with, the software (i.e., they are written to the USB drive).
If the registry is used to store settings, the application's configuration isn't portable, and must be set up on every PC it is used on
Leaves a zero (or near-zero) " footprint" on any PC it's run on after being used.

i.e., All temporary files/registry settings should be removed once the program has exited, and files created by the user can be saved directly to the same removable media as the application is stored on.

bdy.p:
Generally, smaller utility/ toolkit software is inherently fairly portable; though larger applications are sometimes changed in order to allow a portable versions to be released (e.g.,
Opera @USB).

indent.it: This is an , which may never be able to satisfy certain standards for completeness. You can help by expanding it.

list.entry: JCreator Not entirely portable, because it leaves some settings on the host computer.
Portable (needs MinGW installed, which is portable too)
Hackety Hack , which is an educational version of ruby, can be installed on pendrive.
Kerkythea Models made in SketchUp can be easily rendered in Kerkythea
GIMP Portable VS 2008 is the Gimp portable version of Gimp on Microsoft Windows platforms (Windows XP,Vista,NT Server 2003,NT Server 2008)
Portable Gimp - for Mac OS X
Portable Inkscape - for Mac OS X
Scribus Open source DTP, similar to PageMaker InDesign QuarkXPress (Win2K/XP)
EmEditor Professional - for portability, select Import and Export on Tools menu.
NotesHolder - desktop notes, for portability install it in Portable mode.
PSPad - for portable use choose CAB archive

SciTE
- for portability, set SciTE_HOME environment variable before launching
StickyNotes - Not an official portable app but will work as one.
TED Notepad - for portability, create a tednpad.ini file
Textpad for text documents of every sort.
VEDIT - for portability, check "Install onto removable USB drive" checkbox on the first setup dialog.

sec.p: See List of portable computer games

list.entry: Mozilla Firefox, Portable Edition (aka Firefox Portable)
Portable Mail - for Mac OS X
Portable iChat - for Mac OS X
Free Download Manager - Note: installation required to create portable version.''

entry.it:
Note: Requires a Mozilla based browser, e.g.
SeaMonkey , or Firefox.''
Note: mIRC is not a portable application but it has U3 support meaning that it can be installed on U3 Smart drives. It won't work as a portable any other way.''

list.entry: Portable X-Chat Aqua - for Mac OS X

Portable
Vienna - for Mac OS X

WinSCP Portable Edition -
SFTP
/
SCP
/ FTP client, remote file manager, GUI -- see
WinSCP
.

p.it:
See List of LiveDistros and
Live USB

list.entry: Moka5 LivePC Engine (Portable VMWare). Note: Dynamically loads and unloads network drivers and requires administrator rights.
Mojopac portable chopped down copy of windows. Requires administrator rights.
Audiograbber is a CD audio extractor (digitally).

SUPER - (Simplified Universal Player Encoder & Renderer) is a program that easily encapsulates the capabilities of ffmpeg, MEncoder, mplayer, x264, mppenc, ffmpeg2theora, and the theora/vorbis RealProducer plugIn. Has problems with portability.
TMPGEnc - a video encoder that supports HDV import/output along with DivX 6 AVI, MPEG-1/2/4, QuickTime (MOV), and Window Media (WMV/WMV-HD/WMA) input/output.
Portable Audacity - for Windows and Mac OS X
Reaper has a .bat file for a USB stick installation
The KMPlayer - A useful portable player (use zip version to make it portable)
Portable VLC for Mac OS X

ss2.st: Web applications run using the HTTP server
ss2.p:
Once a portable web server such as
XAMPP or WOS is running, portable applications requiring the Apache and
MySQL
can then be run. Some examples of which are:
Mediawiki - the software that powers
Wikipedia
Drupal and Joomla - open source content management systems

list.entry:
Portable
Nvu
and
KompoZer
- for Mac OS X and Windows.
OpenOffice.org Portable - Complete office suite, which includes HTML editor.
Portable Sunbird - for Mac OS X, and Windows
Portable iCal - for Mac OS X
Directory Opus by selecting the USB/U3 export option

WinRAR , Portable version for Windows, still requires having a license for a regular version of WinRAR. The version number for WinRAR Unplugged is 3.7.1.1, while the latest WinRAR for Windows version is 3.71.
Converber is a unit converter that supports over 1000 various units of measure in 32 categories. Customizable.
Portable OpenOffice - for Mac OS X
HijackThis Powerful tool for listing all startup programs and other hidden system modifications.
Spybot - Search & Destroy Note - Requires power user or administrator privileges for Windows XP

p.it: Note: All of the software in this section requires administrator privileges to start their respective drivers.

ss1.p:
Visual maps of free space and biggest files and folders on hard drive.
Scanner
SpaceMonger
CCleaner

list.entry: CPU-Z - CPU and memory hardware details - clock and FSB speeds, SPD, OS version.
AIDA32 - freeware system information, diagnostics, and auditing program written by Tamas Miklos, Win 95-XP.
Recuva Not an official portable app but does work as one.
VMware ThinApp , a virtualization suite (with the ability to make portable programs)
